mapper.select: SELECT apply.*, CAST(apply.created_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS created_at, CAST(apply.end_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS end_date, CAST(apply.start_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS start_date, CAST(apply.open_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS open_date, CAST(apply.updated_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS updated_at, sub_category.*, files.*, place.* FROM apply JOIN sub_category ON apply.sub_category_seq = sub_category.sub_category_seq JOIN place ON apply.place_seq = place.place_seq JOIN files ON apply.application_seq = files.files_parent_seq WHERE apply.status != '승인 완료' AND apply.status !='승인 반려' AND apply.status !='취소' AND files.files_type = 'poster' AND apply.id = #{id} ORDER BY apply.created_at DESC

select apply.* , CAST(apply.created_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS created_at, CAST(apply.end_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS end_date, CAST(apply.start_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS start_date, CAST(apply.open_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS open_date, CAST(apply.updated_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS updated_at, sub_category.*, files.*, PLACE.* from apply join sub_category on apply.sub_category_seq = sub_category.sub_category_seq join place on apply.place_seq = place.place_seq join files on apply.application_seq = files.files_parent_seq where apply.status = '승인 완료' or apply.status='승인 반려' and files.files_type='poster' and apply.id = #{id} and apply.updated_at BETWEEN (CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1' MONTH) AND CURRENT_DATE order by apply.created_at desc

WITH sale_ranked AS ( SELECT sale.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY sale.application_seq ORDER BY sale.sale_seq) AS rn FROM sale ) SELECT apply.*, CAST(apply.created_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS created_at, CAST(apply.end_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS end_date, CAST(apply.start_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS start_date, CAST(apply.open_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS open_date, CAST(apply.updated_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS updated_at, sub_category.*, files.*, place.*, sale_ranked.sale_approved FROM apply JOIN sub_category ON apply.sub_category_seq = sub_category.sub_category_seq JOIN place ON apply.place_seq = place.place_seq JOIN files ON apply.application_seq = files.files_parent_seq LEFT JOIN sale_ranked ON sale_ranked.application_seq = apply.application_seq AND sale_ranked.rn = 1 WHERE apply.status = '승인 완료' AND apply.id = #{id} AND CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN apply.start_date AND apply.end_date ORDER BY apply.created_at DESC

select apply.* , CAST(apply.created_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS created_at, CAST(apply.end_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS end_date, CAST(apply.start_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS start_date, CAST(apply.open_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS open_date, CAST(apply.updated_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS updated_at, sub_category.*, files.*, PLACE.* from apply join sub_category on apply.sub_category_seq = sub_category.sub_category_seq join place on apply.place_seq = place.place_seq join files on apply.application_seq = files.files_parent_seq where apply.status = '승인 완료' and files.files_type='poster' and apply.id = #{id} and apply.start_date > CURRENT_DATE order by apply.created_at desc

select apply.* , CAST(apply.created_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS created_at, CAST(apply.end_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS end_date, CAST(apply.start_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS start_date, CAST(apply.open_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS open_date, CAST(apply.updated_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS updated_at, sub_category.*, files.*, PLACE.* from apply join sub_category on apply.sub_category_seq = sub_category.sub_category_seq join place on apply.place_seq = place.place_seq join files on apply.application_seq = files.files_parent_seq where apply.status = '승인 완료' and files.files_type='poster' and apply.id = #{id} and apply.end_date < CURRENT_DATE order by apply.created_at desc
mapper.update: UPDATE apply SET status = '취소' WHERE application_seq = #{applicationSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT a.application_seq, a.id, a.name, a.place_seq, a.start_date, a.end_date, MIN(s.sale_rate) AS sale_rate, s.sale_approved, p.place_name, MAX(s.sale_seq) AS sale_seq, f.files_sysname FROM apply a JOIN sale s ON a.application_seq = s.application_seq JOIN place p ON a.place_seq = p.place_seq LEFT JOIN files f ON f.files_parent_seq = a.application_seq AND f.files_type = 'poster' WHERE s.sale_approved = '승인 대기' GROUP BY a.application_seq, a.id, a.name, a.place_seq, a.start_date, a.end_date, s.sale_approved, p.place_name, f.files_sysname ORDER BY MAX(s.sale_seq) DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE sale SET sale_approved = '취소' WHERE application_seq = #{applicationSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT a.application_seq, a.id, a.name, a.place_seq, a.start_date, a.end_date, MIN(s.sale_rate) AS sale_rate, s.sale_approved, p.place_name, MAX(s.sale_seq) AS sale_seq, f.files_sysname FROM apply a JOIN sale s ON a.application_seq = s.application_seq JOIN place p ON a.place_seq = p.place_seq LEFT JOIN files f ON f.files_parent_seq = a.application_seq AND f.files_type = 'poster' WHERE s.sale_approved = '승인 완료' GROUP BY a.application_seq, a.id, a.name, a.place_seq, a.start_date, a.end_date, s.sale_approved, p.place_name, f.files_sysname ORDER BY MAX(s.sale_seq) DESC
